snippet: Patriots running back Danny Woodhead is a tiny player from a tiny college, Chadron State, but he has always dreamed on a much larger scale.
abstract: New England Patriots pint-size running back Danny Woodhead, who was mostly ignored by major colleges and overlooked in the NFL draft, has found his place as an offensive weapon for the Patriots.
lead_paragraph: Patriots running back Danny Woodhead is a tiny player from a tiny college, Chadron State, but he has always dreamed on a much larger scale.

headline.seo: Danny Woodhead Is a Big Talent in a Small Package
headline.main: A Big Talent in a Small Package
